thought: To craft lime_stained_glass, I need to place 8 glass blocks in the crafting grid and a lime_dye in the center. I will move one of the glass blocks from slot 28 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
